languages.text: {n}Абеляр щурится и всматривается в Махария и свиту позади него. На секунду его цепкий взгляд словно улавливает что-то, но тут же упускает из виду. Разочарованный выдох подсказывает: "Это мог быть Зауэрбэк... но действительно ли это он?"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр щурится и всматривается в Махария и свиту позади него. На секунду его цепкий взгляд словно улавливает что-то, но тут же упускает из виду. Разочарованный выдох подсказывает — "Это мог быть Зауэрбек, но действительно ли это он?"{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. For a second, his sharp eyes seem to have caught sight of something, only to lose track of it the next moment. A disappointed sigh tells you, "It could be a Sauerback... but is he really the one behind all this?"{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр щурится и всматривается в Махария и свиту позади него. На секунду его цепкий взгляд словно улавливает что-то, но тут же упускает из виду. Разочарованный выдох подсказывает: "Это мог быть Зауэрбэк... но действительно ли это он?"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard squints his eyes and looks at Macharius and his retinue behind him. For a second, his sharp eyes seen to catch something, but losing it the next moment. A disappointed sigh tells you — "It could be a Sauerback... but could they really be the one?"{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは目を細めてマハリウス・ザウアーバックとその後ろの取り巻きたちを見る。しばらくして、アベラルドの鋭い目つきが何かを捉えたようだが、次の瞬間には見逃してしまった。失望のため息があなたに告げる。「ザウアーバック家の者かもしれません…ですが、本当に犯人なのでしょうか？」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. For a second, his sharp eyes seem to have caught sight of something, only to lose track of it the next moment. A disappointed sigh tells you, "It could be a Sauerback... but is he really the one behind all this?"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは目を細めてマハリウス・ザウアーバックとその後ろの取り巻きたちを見る。しばらくして、アベラルドの鋭い目つきが何かを捉えたようだが、次の瞬間には見逃してしまった。失望のため息があなたに告げる。「ザウアーバック家の者かもしれません…ですが、本当に犯人なのでしょうか？」{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德眯起眼睛，从头到尾打量着马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克和他身后的随从。刹那之间，他锐利的目光似乎捕捉到了什么东西，却又在下一刻失去了目标的踪迹。他发出了失望的叹息，仿佛是在告诉你：“或许可能是苏尔贝克家族的人……但他真的是这一切的幕后黑手吗？”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. For a second, his sharp eyes seem to have caught sight of something, only to lose track of it the next moment. A disappointed sigh tells you, "It could be a Sauerback... but is he really the one behind all this?"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德眯起眼睛，从头到尾打量着马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克和他身后的随从。刹那之间，他锐利的目光似乎捕捉到了什么东西，却又在下一刻失去了目标的踪迹。他发出了失望的叹息，仿佛是在告诉你：“或许可能是苏尔贝克家族的人……但他真的是这一切的幕后黑手吗？”{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard observe Macharius et son entourage en plissant les yeux, comme s'il avait aperçu quelque chose qui lui avait échappé l'instant d'après. Son soupir déçu vous fait comprendre que le coupable pourrait être un Sauerback... mais qu'il n'en est pas tout à fait certain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. For a second, his sharp eyes seem to have caught sight of something, only to lose track of it the next moment. A disappointed sigh tells you, "It could be a Sauerback... but is he really the one behind all this?"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard observe Macharius et son entourage en plissant les yeux, comme s'il avait aperçu quelque chose qui lui avait échappé l'instant d'après. Son soupir déçu vous fait comprendre que le coupable pourrait être un Sauerback... mais qu'il n'en est pas tout à fait certain.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard entrecierra los ojos y mira a Macharius Sauerback y a todo el séquito que tiene detrás. Por un momento, sus ojos parecen haber divisado algo, tan solo para perderlo de vista un segundo después. Un suspiro de decepción te dice: «Quizás sea uno de los Sauerback... ¿pero es realmente obra suya?».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. For a second, his sharp eyes seem to have caught sight of something, only to lose track of it the next moment. A disappointed sigh tells you, "It could be a Sauerback... but is he really the one behind all this?"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard entrecierra los ojos y mira a Macharius Sauerback y a todo el séquito que tiene detrás. Por un momento, sus ojos parecen haber divisado algo, tan solo para perderlo de vista un segundo después. Un suspiro de decepción te dice: «Quizás sea uno de los Sauerback... ¿pero es realmente obra suya?».{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard kneift die Augen zusammen und mustert Macharius Sauerback und dessen Entourage. Einen Sekunde wirkt es, als hätten er etwas gesehen, doch einen Augenblick später verliert er es wieder aus den Augen. Sein enttäuschtes Seufzen sagt dir: "Es könnte ein Sauerback sein ... aber steckt wirklich er hinter all dem?"{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. For a second, his sharp eyes seem to have caught sight of something, only to lose track of it the next moment. A disappointed sigh tells you, "It could be a Sauerback... but is he really the one behind all this?"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard kneift die Augen zusammen und blickt Macharius und sein hinter ihm stehendes Gefolge an. Einen Sekunde wirkt es, als hätten seine scharfen Augen etwas erblickt, was aber wohl sofort wieder verschwunden ist. Er seufzt enttäuscht. "Es könnte ein Sauerback sein ... aber können sie es wirklich sein?"{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, gözlerini kısıp Macharius Sauerback'i ve yanındaki maiyetini dikkatle inceliyor. Haşin gözleri, bir an için dikkatini başka bir şey çekmiş gibi kaysa da o şey her neyse aklından hemen çıkıyor. Düş kırıklığını yansıtan hayıflanmasından âdeta "Fail, Sauerback Hanesi'nden olabilir... Fakat doğru kişinin o olduğundan emin miyiz?" dediğini anlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and scrutinises Macharius Sauerback and his retinue standing behind him. For a second, his sharp eyes seem to have caught sight of something, only to lose track of it the next moment. A disappointed sigh tells you, "It could be a Sauerback... but is he really the one behind all this?"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard gözlerini kısıp Macharius Sauerback'i ve yanındaki maiyetini dikkatle inceliyor. Haşin gözleri, bir an için dikkatini başka bir şey çekmiş gibi kayıyor ama o şey neyse aklından hemen çıkıyor. Düş kırıklığını yansıtan hayıflanmasından âdeta "Fail Sauerback Hanesi mensubu olabilir... ama doğru kişinin bu olduğundan emin miyiz?" dediğini anlıyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
